<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataMC extends data { const CODE = 'MC'; const PREFIX = 377; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '870\d{5}|(?:[349]|6\d)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:870|9[2-47-9]\d)\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '4(?:4\d|5[1-9])\d{5}|(?:3|6\d)\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '90\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', '(\d)(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4 $5', ); }
